About us

An airline for everyone

Airvalencia, the official Valencian virtual airline founded in April 2020 operates all types of operations (SO as well!). Any aviation enthusiast can be a pilot at airvalencia, you just have to have a compatible flight simulator and register! Enjoy from the most modern airliners to the most iconic ones! You have at your disposal hundreds of routes with which you can fly one of our aircraft. Airvalencia pilots do also have exclusive content to documentation of aircraft approved by real airline pilots, from Checklists, to complete Procedures! It's up to you! Choose what you want to fly!

Our School

At airvalencia we want to teach our pilots in a very professional way. When entering the virtual airline you may need to participate in a type rating to get to fly with our aircraft. We also do shared-cockpit flights, official airvalencia events, tours, etc.
